title: American Digital News ~ May 24, 2022
cleaned_text:
American Digital News and The ADN Community welcome you to today’s news. Leading stories, updates to relevant stories, Positivity Moments along with our daily Scripture verse await you. Join us every Monday thru Friday at 5:30pm EST in the ADN Community Voice Chat. #ADNistheNewsNOW

ADN COMMUNITY ~~ VOICE CHAT ~~ 🎙AUDIO RECORDING

In today’s political, religious & radically charged society; staying well informed is more important than ever. Who do you trust? What can you believe? Where will you turn for news? With more & more fake news, sensational click bait headlines & propaganda articles clouding the truth; using biased & unreliable sources to stay informed can lead to radical views & often closed-minded political beliefs. If you don’t challenge those opinionated sources, you will end up distrusting legitimate facts & verified information. ADN provides accurate & verified sources including articles pertinent to yesterday, today and tomorrow.
